sentences.sentence: Walking home after dinner, your diarist gets hopelessly lost.
sentences.translation: 饭后我们走路回家时，我们的记者完全走失了。

sentences.sentence: Your diarist has (by British standards) excellent German. But it is hard to use it.
sentences.translation: 我们的记者(以英国人的标准)会说优秀的德语，但是用起来很困难。

sentences.sentence: Your diarist wrote condolence notes to every Pole in his contacts book after the tragedy.
sentences.translation: 悲剧发生后，我们的记者在他的书中对每个波兰人写了封吊唁信。
